text: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom is a British children’s animated TV show. The show was created by Neville Astley and Mark Baker. The music is produced by Julian Nott, who is noted for his Wallace and Gromit and Peppa Pig scores. It first aired on 2008 and ended in 2013. On May 3, 2019 a live on stage show about the show was announced. These Episodes are made for The Production. == Episodes == Episode Name First aired Episode description Notes Episode number in season The Royal Picnic TBA The family goes to a picnic. They do not want a “jelly flood” to happen again. This is the first episode.
